title: Procurement in SAP S/4HANA
headline: This free online course will teach you to use SAP S/4HANA for master data management and procurement automation.
description: This online procurement course will teach you how to use SAP S/4HANA for master data management, purchase requisition, invoice processing, and inventory management. Learn to utilise the app to optimise your purchasing and procurement processes to maximise operational efficiency in your organisation. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced user of S/4HANA, you will be able to automate your procurement processes by taking this course. Enrol now!
courseDescription:
Many organisations have enormous amounts of unprocessed data, which amounts to thousands of gigabytes of resources you can use to speed up business operations and offer higher customer value. With SAP S/4HANA, business organisations can access in-memory processing and real-time data analytics to aid management decisions and ensure the rapid usability of available data. It is an all-in-one solution that facilitates the standardisation of the procurement process in an organisation. It offers an all-inclusive function for vendor management, invoice verification, contract management, inventory processing and operational purchasing.

This free online course was designed by Winfried WÃ¼rzer, an in-house consultant for SAP procurement and an MRP controller with over 18 years of experience as a purchaser and trainer. To begin, we will explore the properties of Fiori apps. You will learn about the Fiori app types and its library. Next, we will examine the changes and new features of the Material Master in SAP S/4HANA. Investigate how to use a business partner in a migration project, including how to assign numbers to the business partners and how to maintain business partner roles. We will discuss manual purchase requisitions, purchase requisitions in Employee Self Service (ESS), flexible workflows used for purchase requisitions and analytical apps for purchase requisitions.

Furthermore, we will demonstrate how to create and manage the templates for purchase contracts. You will learn about contract releases, including the flexible workflows for releasing contracts. Similarly, you will study supplier evaluation methodologies and output management procedures. Included are the methods for posting goods receipts and inventory analysis. Finally, we will consider the SAP Ariba solutions for e-procurement and the additional benefits they add to the procurement process. This online course will help you automate management activities and improve your procurement processes with SAP S/4HANA. Start learning now!
